structural_units.address:
Nooruse 1
50411 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Students participate in the organizational activities of the international pharmacy conference, participate in the conference and present a short summary based on it.
description.et: Üliõpilased osalevad rahvusvahelise farmaatsia konverentsi korralduslikes tegevustes, osalevad konverentsil ning esitavad selle põhjal lühikokkuvõtte.

objectives.en: The aim of the subject is to give students an understanding of the structure of an international conference and introduce the organizational side of the conference.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärgiks on anda üliõpilastele arusaam rahvusvahelise konverentsi ülesehitusest ja tutvustada konverentsi korralduslikku poolt.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who completed the course:
- participates in the preparations for the international conference
- participates in the organizational activities of the international conference
- listens to at least one lecture by an invited speaker and three oral presentations at an international conference.
learning_outcomes.et: - kuulab vähemalt ühte kutsutud esineja loengut ning kolme suulist ettekannet rahvusvahelisel konverentsil.
